Design the Future,
Defend Your legacy.
Bot Bash 2025 is an exciting robot fighting event organized by Tech to Oxygen, set to take place on March 28th, 2025. This open event invites participants and spectators to witness intense robot battles where creativity and engineering skills collide. Best of all, registration and entry are completely free, making it accessible for everyone to join the excitement.

We're dedicated to delivering a memorable experience filled with innovaton, competition, and fun. Whether you're a robotics enthusiast, a tech lover, or simply seeking an action-packed event, Bot Bash 2025 promises a thrilling day where powerful machines face off in epic battles. Don't miss out on this electrifying experience! Participants Guide

Frequently Asked Questions
+  What is Bot Bash?
Bot Bash is a high-energy battle bot competition where teams design, build, and fight custom robots.
+  Is this event free?
Yes, this event is totally free.
+  Which type of wepons should we use for our battle bots?
Projectile wepons (must not be explosives), spinning wepons, lifter/flipper wepons, flame guns are allowed to use. for more information, see rules & regulations.
+  How many members per team?
A team can have upto five members.
+  What are the safety rules?
All bots must pass a safety inspection to ensure they adhere to our guidelines before competing.
